verses.name: Lamentations 3:8
verses.text: Also when I cry and shout, he shutteth out my prayer.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:9
verses.text: He hath inclosed my ways with hewn stone, he hath made my paths crooked.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:10
verses.text: He was unto me as a bear lying in wait, and as a lion in secret places.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:11
verses.text: He hath turned aside my ways, and pulled me in pieces: he hath made me desolate.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:12
verses.text: He hath bent his bow, and set me as a mark for the arrow.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:13
verses.text: He hath caused the arrows of his quiver to enter into my reins.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:14
verses.text: I was a derision to all my people; and their song all the day.
